archive_targets.1-1-a: Reduce poverty by 4 times, including by eliminating extreme poverty
archive_targets.1-2-a: Increase the coverage of poor people with targeted social assistance programmes
archive_targets.1-3-a: Increase the resilience of socially vulnerable groups of the population
archive_targets.10-1-a: Ensure accelerated growth of income of the least well-off 40 percent of the population
archive_targets.10-2-a: Prevent manifestations of discrimination in society
archive_targets.10-4-a: Pursue remuneration policy based on equality and fairness
archive_targets.10-5-a: Reform pension insurance based on fairness and transparency
archive_targets.11-2-a: Ensure development of settlements and territories exclusively based on integrated planning and participatory management
archive_targets.11-3-a: Ensure protection and safeguarding of the cultural and natural heritage, with involvement of the private sector
archive_targets.11-4-a: Ensure timely public alert about emergencies through innovative technologies
archive_targets.11-5-a: Reduce the adverse impact of pollutants, including on the urban environment in particular, through innovative technologies
archive_targets.11-6-a: Ensure the development and implementation of local development strategies aimed at economic growth, job creation, tourism, recreation and development of the local culture, and production of local products
archive_targets.12-1-a: Reduce resource consumption of the economy
archive_targets.12-2-a: Reduce the loss of food along the production and marketing chains
archive_targets.12-3-a: Ensure sustainable use of chemicals through innovative technologies and production
archive_targets.12-4-a: Reduce the amount of waste generation, and increase recycling and reuse through innovative technologies and production
archive_targets.13-1-a: Limit greenhouse gas emissions in the economy
archive_targets.14-2-a: Ensure the sustainable management and protection of marine and coastal ecosystems, and improve their resilience and recovery through innovative technologies
archive_targets.14-3-a: Implement effective regulation of extraction of marine resources
archive_targets.15-1-a: Ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems
archive_targets.15-3-a: Restore degraded lands and soils through innovative technologies
archive_targets.15-4-a: Ensure the conservation of mountain ecosystems
archive_targets.16-2-a: Increase detection of victims of human trafficking and all forms of exploitation
archive_targets.16-3-a: Increase confidence in courts and ensure equal access to justice
archive_targets.16-4-a: Strengthen the system for preventing and counteracting the legalization of illegal incomes, the financing of terrorism and the proliferation of weapons of mass destruction
archive_targets.16-5-a: Reduce illicit trafficking of weapons, ammunition and explosive materials
archive_targets.16-7-a: Increase the efficiency of government bodies and local self-government
archive_targets.16-8-a: Recovery of conflict affected areas in eastern Ukraine (Donbas)
archive_targets.16-9-a: Strengthen social stability, and promote peacebuilding and community security
archive_targets.17-1-a: Mobilize additional financial resources by promoting foreign and domestic investment
archive_targets.17-2-a: Consistently reduce the debt burden on the economy
archive_targets.17-3-a: Develop a partnership between government and business to achieve the SDGs
archive_targets.2-1-a: Ensure food security and improved nutrition
archive_targets.2-3-a: Double the agricultural productivity and incomes of small-scale food producers
archive_targets.3-2-a: Minimize preventable mortality among children under 5
archive_targets.3-3-a: End the epidemics of HIV/AIDS and tuberculosis, including through innovative practices and treatments
archive_targets.3-4-a: Reduce premature mortality from noncommunicable diseases
archive_targets.3-5-a: Reduce by a quarter premature mortality, including through the introduction of innovative approaches to diagnosing diseases
archive_targets.3-6-a: Reduce serious injuries and deaths from road traffic accidents, including through innovative practices of resuscitation, treatment and rehabilitation after road traffic accidents
archive_targets.3-7-a: Ensure universal, quality immunization with innovative vaccines
archive_targets.3-8-a: Reduce the prevalence of smoking among the population through innovative media to inform about negative effects of smoking
archive_targets.4-1-a: Ensure access to quality school education for all children and adolescents
archive_targets.4-2-a: Ensure access to quality pre-primary development for all children
archive_targets.4-4-a: Improve the quality of tertiary education and ensure its close relationship with science, and promote the establishment of towns of education and science in the country
archive_targets.4-5-a: Increase the prevalence of knowledge and skills required for decent jobs and entrepreneurship among the population
archive_targets.4-6-a: Eliminate gender disparities among school teachers
archive_targets.4-7-a: Create a modern learning environment in schools, including inclusive education, through innovative approaches
archive_targets.5-1-a: Create an environment for ending all forms of discrimination against women and girls
archive_targets.5-2-a: Reduce the level of gender-based and domestic violence, and ensure efficient prevention of its manifestations and timely assistance to victims
archive_targets.5-3-a: Encourage shared responsibility for housekeeping and childrearing
archive_targets.5-4-a: Ensure equal opportunities for representation at all levels of decisionmaking in political and public life
archive_targets.5-5-a: Increase the population’s access to family planning services and reduce teenage fertility
archive_targets.6-1-a: Provide access to quality services of safe drinking water, and ensure the construction and reconstruction of centralized drinking water supply systems using the latest technologies and equipment
archive_targets.6-2-a: Provide access to modern sanitation systems, and ensure the construction and reconstruction of water intake and sewage treatment facilities using the latest technologies and equipment
archive_targets.6-3-a: Reduce the discharge of untreated wastewater, primarily through innovative technologies of water purification at the national and individual levels
archive_targets.6-4-a: Increase the efficiency of water use
archive_targets.7-1-a: Expand the infrastructure and modernize networks for reliable and sustainable energy supply through the introduction of innovative technologies
archive_targets.7-2-a: Ensure diversification of the supply of primary energy resources
archive_targets.7-3-a: Increase the share of renewable energy in the national energy balance, in particular through the introduction of additional capacities at facilities that produce energy from renewable sources
archive_targets.7-4-a: Increase the energy efficiency of the economy
archive_targets.8-1-a: Ensure a steady GDP growth by modernizing production, developing innovation, increasing export potential and exporting products with high value added
archive_targets.8-2-a: Increase the efficiency of production based on sustainable development and the development of competitive high-tech industries
archive_targets.8-4-a: Reduce the share of youth not in employment, education or professional training
archive_targets.8-5-a: Promote a safe and secure working environment for all workers, including through the application of innovative technologies in terms of health and safety
archive_targets.8-6-a: Create institutional and financial capacities for the self-realization of the potential of the economically active population and the development of the creative economy
archive_targets.9-1-a: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and accessible infrastructure based on the use of innovation technologies, including ecologically clean means of transport
archive_targets.9-2-a: Ensure increased use of electric transport and related network infrastructure
archive_targets.9-3-a: Ensure access to road infrastructure based on the use of innovative technologies, in particular by expanding state participation in various infrastructure projects
archive_targets.9-4-a: Promote accelerated development of high- and medium-technological sectors and manufacturing industries which are formed based on the use of ‘education–science–production’ chains and a cluster approach by areas — development of an innovation ecosystem; development of ICT; use of ICT in agriculture, energy, transport and industry; high-technology mechanical engineering; creation of new materials; development of pharmaceutical and bioengineering industry
archive_targets.9-5-a: Create financial and institutional systems (innovative infrastructure) that will ensure the development of scientific research and scientific and technical (experimental) development
archive_targets.9-6-a: Ensure access to the Internet, especially in rural areas
archive_targets.9-7-a: Ensure increased youth participation in research

frontpage.intro_body: The Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) are a universal call to action to end poverty, protect the planet and improve the lives and prospects of everyone, everywhere. The 17 Goals were adopted by all UN Member States in 2015, as part of the 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development.

global_targets.1-1-a-title: Reduce poverty by 4 times, including by eliminating extreme poverty
global_targets.1-1-title: Reducing the share of families living in poverty (at risk of falling below the poverty line)
global_targets.1-2-a-title: Increase the coverage of poor people with targeted social assistance programmes
global_targets.1-2-title: Increasing the share of coverage of the poor population by targeted social support programs
global_targets.1-3-a-title: Increase the resilience of socially vulnerable groups of the population
global_targets.1-3-title: Increasing the level of resilience of socially vulnerable groups of the population
global_targets.1-4-title: By 2030, ensure that all men and women, in particular the poor and the vulnerable, have equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to basic services, ownership and control over land and other forms of property, inheritance, natural resources, appropriate new technology and financial services, including microfinance
global_targets.1-5-title: By 2030, build the resilience of the poor and those in vulnerable situations and reduce their exposure and vulnerability to climate-related extreme events and other economic, social and environmental shocks and disasters
global_targets.1-a-title: Ensure significant mobilization of resources from a variety of sources, including through enhanced development cooperation, in order to provide adequate and predictable means for developing countries, in particular least developed countries, to implement programmes and policies to end poverty in all its dimensions
global_targets.1-b-title: Create sound policy frameworks at the national, regional and international levels, based on pro-poor and gender-sensitive development strategies, to support accelerated investment in poverty eradication actions
global_targets.10-1-a-title: Ensure accelerated growth of income of the least well-off 40 percent of the population
global_targets.10-1-title: Promoting the reduce of difference in the level of income of the population
global_targets.10-2-a-title: Prevent manifestations of discrimination in society
global_targets.10-3-title: Ensuring the availability of social services
global_targets.10-4-a-title: Pursue remuneration policy based on equality and fairness
global_targets.10-5-a-title: Reform pension insurance based on fairness and transparency
global_targets.10-5-title: Ensuring the creation of appropriate barrier-free infrastructure
global_targets.10-6-title: Ensuring equal rights and opportunities for different age groups
global_targets.10-7-title: Promoting orderly, safe, legal and responsible migration and mobility of people, in particular through planned and well-managed migration policy
global_targets.10-a-title: Implement the principle of special and differential treatment for developing countries, in particular least developed countries, in accordance with World Trade Organization agreements
global_targets.10-b-title: Encourage official development assistance and financial flows, including foreign direct investment, to States where the need is greatest, in particular least developed countries, African countries, small island developing States and landlocked developing countries, in accordance with their national plans and programmes
global_targets.10-c-title: By 2030, reduce to less than 3 per cent the transaction costs of migrant remittances and eliminate remittance corridors with costs higher than 5 per cent
global_targets.11-1-title: Ensuring the population’s access to housing of adequate quality, especially for those who lost his home as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine
global_targets.11-2-a-title: Ensure development of settlements and territories exclusively based on integrated planning and participatory management
global_targets.11-2-title: Ensuring sustainable, reliable, fast, safe and inclusive urban mobility
global_targets.11-3-a-title: Ensure protection and safeguarding of the cultural and natural heritage, with involvement of the private sector
global_targets.11-3-title: Ensuring access of urban inhabitants to water bodies and forest and park areas
global_targets.11-4-a-title: Ensure timely public alert about emergencies through innovative technologies
global_targets.11-4-title: Increasing the resilience of settlements and territorial communities to the consequences of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, natural disasters, extraordinary situations and climate change
global_targets.11-5-a-title: Reduce the adverse impact of pollutants, including on the urban environment in particular, through innovative technologies
global_targets.11-5-title: Reducing the negative impact of territorial communities on the environment
global_targets.11-6-a-title: Ensure the development and implementation of local development strategies aimed at economic growth, job creation, tourism, recreation and development of the local culture, and production of local products
global_targets.11-6-title: Ensuring the preservation and sustainable use of cultural and natural heritage
global_targets.11-7-title: Increasing the level of energy efficiency of buildings
global_targets.11-a-title: Support positive economic, social and environmental links between urban, peri-urban and rural areas by strengthening national and regional development planning
global_targets.11-b-title: By 2020, substantially increase the number of cities and human settlements adopting and implementing integrated policies and plans towards inclusion, resource efficiency, mitigation and adaptation to climate change, resilience to disasters, and develop and implement, in line with the Sendai Framework for Disaster Risk Reduction 2015–2030, holistic disaster risk management at all levels
global_targets.11-c-title: Support least developed countries, including through financial and technical assistance, in building sustainable and resilient buildings utilizing local materials
global_targets.12-1-a-title: Reduce resource consumption of the economy
global_targets.12-2-a-title: Reduce the loss of food along the production and marketing chains
global_targets.12-2-title: Reducing food losses in production and distribution chains
global_targets.12-3-a-title: Ensure sustainable use of chemicals through innovative technologies and production
global_targets.12-3-title: Promoting sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources
global_targets.12-4-a-title: Reduce the amount of waste generation, and increase recycling and reuse through innovative technologies and production
global_targets.12-4-title: Promoting the safe and sustainable use of chemicals
global_targets.12-5-title: Promoting the level of awareness of the population about responsible consumption and production
global_targets.12-6-title: Encourage companies, especially large and transnational companies, to adopt sustainable practices and to integrate sustainability information into their reporting cycle
global_targets.12-7-title: Promote public procurement practices that are sustainable, in accordance with national policies and priorities
global_targets.12-8-title: By 2030, ensure that people everywhere have the relevant information and awareness for sustainable development and lifestyles in harmony with nature
global_targets.12-a-title: Support developing countries to strengthen their scientific and technological capacity to move towards more sustainable patterns of consumption and production
global_targets.12-b-title: Develop and implement tools to monitor sustainable development impacts for sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products
global_targets.12-c-title: Rationalize inefficient fossil-fuel subsidies that encourage wasteful consumption by removing market distortions, in accordance with national circumstances, including by restructuring taxation and phasing out those harmful subsidies, where they exist, to reflect their environmental impacts, taking fully into account the specific needs and conditions of developing countries and minimizing the possible adverse impacts on their development in a manner that protects the poor and the affected communities
global_targets.13-1-a-title: Limit greenhouse gas emissions in the economy
global_targets.13-1-title: Fulfilling obligations under the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change and the Paris Agreement
global_targets.13-2-title: Improving energy efficiency to reduce greenhouse gas emissions
global_targets.13-3-title: Improve education, awareness-raising and human and institutional capacity on climate change mitigation, adaptation, impact reduction and early warning
